title: List of presidents of FIFA - Wikipedia
snippet: Presidents Daniel Burley Woolfall, Rodolphe Seeldrayers, and Arthur Drewry died during their term in office. The current president is Swiss-Italian Gianni Infantino, elected on 26 February 2016 during ...

title: Inside FIFA
snippet: He brought together representatives of the first seven member countries in Paris for the signing of FIFA's foundation act and agreement of the first FIFA statutes. On 22 May 1904, Guerin - then just 28 - was elected president at the inaugural FIFA Congress and remained in his post for two years, during which time another eight associations came on board, including the English Football Association.

title: Gianni Infantino - Wikipedia
snippet: Giovanni Vincenzo Infantino (born 23 March 1970) is a Swiss-Italian football administrator and the president of FIFA since 2016. He has also been an International Olympic Committee member since 2020. Following his initial election to the FIFA presidency on 26 February 2016, he was re-elected ...

title: List of presidents of FIFA facts for kids
snippet: FIFA is the main organization that controls association football (soccer) around the world. Some presidents, like Daniel Burley Woolfall, Rodolphe Seeldrayers, and Arthur Drewry, passed away while they were still in office.
